title: Wifi plz
body: Whenever i play leauge of legends my wifi tends to die and since riot added the shitty remake option ive been leaving games bc my wifi keeps dying and when it even my wifi does come back on the game doesnt even fucking let me reconnect so i have to fucking restart my computer and sometime that doesnt even fix it so i have to restart another time and then it works. and all this shit takes longer then 3 min

replies.body:
Hey there guy! 

While Targons Blade may of suggested a wired connection let me ask you a couple that I've dealt with and has helped.

1) Make sure your wireless card is up to date. Amazingly enough this helps more than you would think.
2) Make sure the channel the router is operating on isn't crowded (just google "Wifi channel analyzer" or something along those lines).


Those were the two mains issues I had with my wireless adapter. Ever since updating to the newest driver at the time I haven't had an issue.
Hope it helps!

Do you experience disconnections when you're not connected to WiFi, but instead are connected via Ethernet to your router? This could be an issue with your wireless adapter, the WiFi antennae in your router, or your router entirely. Switching to a wired connection would be a great first step in troubleshooting this so we can find a permanent solution for these disconnections. 

Let me know if you noticed any difference on a wired connection.
